document.full_text: californians have long had an uneasy relationship with their two nuclear power plants, and the crisis in japan raises new doubts about how long nuclear power will survive in the earthquake-prone state.
document.title: quake-prone california questions nuclear safety
lines_and_colors: californians have long had an uneasy relationship with their two nuclear power plants, and the crisis in japan raises new doubts about how long nuclear power will survive in the earthquake-prone state.
